Ingredients.3: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.4: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Fill a large pot with water and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Add chicken; poach in simmering water until no longer pink in center, about 12 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to remove chicken from pot and set aside. Leave water in the pot.

Directions.3: Bring chicken cooking water to a boil. Stir in egg noodles and cook until tender with a slight bite, about 10 minutes. Drain.

Directions.4: Transfer noodles to a large bowl. Cut chicken into bite-size pieces and mix with noodles.

Directions.5: Mix together both condensed soups and sour cream in a separate bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Add soup mixture to chicken mixture and gently stir until combined. Transfer to a 2-quart baking dish.

Directions.6: Melt butter in a small saucepan over low heat and remove from heat. Stir in crumbled crackers. Sprinkle mixture over top of casserole.

Directions.7: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and browned on top, about 30 minutes.
